S02vadhdhgu:69: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma /

S02vadhdhgu:72_1: bhagavantam etad avocat* ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yena sucandro gṛhapatir mahādhano

S02vadhdhgu:76: tena hy ānanda tvam udgṛhṇīṣvemāṃ vasudhārādhāraṇīṃ dhāraya grāhaya /
S02vadhdhgu:80: tad bhaviṣyati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyair mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇāṃ /
S02vadhdhgu:81: nāham ānanda samanupaśyāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ /

S02vadhdhgu:85: tat kasya hetoḥ sarvatathāgatānām eṣā vākyaṃ sarvatathāgatair eṣā dhāraṇī bhāṣitā adhiṣṭhitā /

S02vadhdhgu:86_1: ākhyātā sarvasatvānāṃ daridrāṇāṃ vyādhiparipīḍitānāṃ sarvabhayopadrutānāṃ satvānām arthāyeti /
S02vadhdhgu:88: udgṛhītā me bhagavaṃn iyaṃ vasudhārādhāraṇī dhāritā vācitā /
